How This Bear Market Compares

12 October 2008

How This Bear Market Compares

The NY Times provides an interactive graphic for comparing the current bear market to market declines in previous ones:

  • Aug 1929 - Jun 1932
  • Feb 1937 - Apr 1942
  • Apr 1946 - Jun 1949
  • Nov 1961 - Jun 1962
  • Oct 1968 - May 1970
  • Dec 1972 - Oct 1974
  • Oct 1980 - Aug 1982
  • Jun 1987 - Dec 1987
  • Jun 1990 - Oct 1990
  • Feb 2000 - Mar 2002
  • Sep 2007 - present
